name: 90-SecondDrill
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: This twice-daily podcast is for fans that want the story behind the scores. Dan Schwartzman, noted NBC sports radio host, joins Otto Radio to break the most important stories in the world of sports. When the buzzer sounds, you’re 90 seconds from being in the know.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
